WORLDNOTIFICATION.webhook.name: Webhook URL
WORLDNOTIFICATION.username.name: User Name
WORLDNOTIFICATION.username.hint: User name displayed for the message.
WORLDNOTIFICATION.avatar.name: Avatar URL
WORLDNOTIFICATION.avatar.hint: User avatar for the message, default is empty which will use the avatar set for the webhook.
WORLDNOTIFICATION.open-message.name: Message when world ready
WORLDNOTIFICATION.open-message.hint: Support Discord message formatting, and %worldname% will be replaced by the actual world name.
WORLDNOTIFICATION.close-message.name: Message when world closing
WORLDNOTIFICATION.close-message.hint: Support Discord message formatting, and %worldname% will be replaced by the actual world name.
WORLDNOTIFICATION.close-message.default: Hurry up! The %worldname% portal is closing, I couldn't hold it anymore. Allfathers, let the dark magic flow through me one last ... time.
